alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 11:37AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1137 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 21 miles southeast of Montura, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge and Big Cypress Seminole Reservation. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
